Title: Mr. Bangladesh
Actors: Khijir Hayat Khan, Shanarei Devi Shanu, Shahriar Ferdous Sazeeb, Tiger Robi
Plot: When the rise of Terrorism is imminent one man rises against it as it cost him everything he once loved. He is Mr. Bangladesh. He takes revenge not for his loss but also stand tall to make sure he ignites a revolution for his country men.
